title: FPS and MS is fine but still getting lag
body:
Hi, 

I know this is probably my fault but wanted some advice.

I live in South Africa so we normally play between 180-200ms (sounds bad but actually runs smooth enough to play when is solid) Recently though we changed our internet which caused my ping to drop to about 180ms..... 
This is the problem though, even if my ping is stable i still experience patches where my champ just slides around the map or stands still while fights happen around me.

I am not sure where to go from here, should i flame my ISP or is there a fix i can make in the client?

Please help <3

replies.body: I also currently have the exact same problem also with between 190 - 250 ping. Will using "Hextech Repair Tool" solve the problem?

That champion sliding bit makes it sound like the main problem might be something called packet loss. Let's grab the network logs from one of those laggy games and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it to see what your connection looked like on its way to our servers. Grab a screenshot of what it shows and post it here so I can take a look!
180ms is a high ping. You will probably lag since your ping is pretty high.
